H0.text: Lakes are physical features that exist both on Earth and on the Moon.

H1.text: Forests are a physical feature that exists both on Earth and on the Moon.

H2.text: Mountains are physical features that exist both on Earth and on the Moon.

H3.text: Clouds exist both on Earth and on the Moon.

A4.text: Mountains of the Moon (Africa), a legendary mountain range once thought to be the source of the Nile River in Uganda
